labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: A scrollbar appears on the right and you can scroll up and down in the message box.
data.expected_result: It will just be there like normal text, as it is on Windows.
data.short_description: if you post an OS emoji into the message box on Mac, a scroll bar will appear and you will be able to scroll up and
data.steps_to_repro: - Copy and paste an OS emoji, for example \🍪, into the message box. You can also use the emoji picker.
